players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice is the mafia. Diana was killed last night. I investigated Alice and found them to be the mafia."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob's findings. Alice's confession only solidifies my suspicion."
Charlie: "I'm glad we were able to identify the mafia so early in the game. Let's all work together to ensure their influence is minimized and keep our village safe."
Bob: "Charlie, I appreciate your support. Alice, your silence is telling. As the detective, I can confirm Alice is the mafia. We need to vote her out to win."
You: "I did not kill Diana. I was falsely accused and I want to clear my name. Let's focus on finding the real killer in our midst."
